name: Project & Task Manager
description: Turn your chaos into productivityThis simple project & task management system will help you streamline your to-do list and projects.It's designed to help you stop prioritizing your schedule so you can start scheduling your priorities.This project & task manager also contains a project overview & progress bar and a time tracker for your tasks.Stop managing your to-do lists and start doing them.Template walkthrough:A full video tutorial with chapters can be found here:How To Build A Si
